verses.html:
1
Sound the battle cry! See, the foe is nigh;
Raise the standard high
for the Lord; Gird your armor on,
Stand firm, ev’ry one;
Rest your cause upon His holy word.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Rouse, then, soldiers, rally round the banner,
Ready, steady, pass the word along;
Onward, forward, shout aloud Hosanna!
Christ is Captain of the mighty throng.

2
Strong to meet the foe, marching on we go,
While our cause we know,
must prevail; Shield and banner bright,
gleaming in the light,
Battling for the right We ne’er can fail.

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Rouse, then, soldiers, rally round the banner,
Ready, steady, pass the word along;
Onward, forward, shout aloud Hosanna!
Christ is Captain of the mighty throng.

3
O! Thou God of all, hear us when we call,
Help us one and all
by Thy grace; When the battle’s done,
and the vict’ry’s won,
May we wear the crown before Thy face.
